title: 'Witte': round Bauhaus-style / Similar to Chalet?
content:
Hi,

I need help to identify a font. It's similar to HI Chalet New York 1970. But I really don't know, if there is an earlier version of the chalet. Does anybody know this font?

Nitzki

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140927130053im_/http:/typophile.com/files/witte.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [witte.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140927130053/http:/typophile.com/files/witte.png) | 6.09 KB |
author: nitzki

comments.content:
Hi Nicky,

that could aswell be a modified (or pre-digital version of) [Pump](http://web.archive.org/web/20140927130053/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/pump_complete_vp/?&sample_text=Witte&sample_size=96).  
See more Bauhaus-style typefaces in [Mike’s Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20140927130053/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces1.html).

F

Hi Florian,

thx for your help! If there was another font-weight of the _pump_, this could be the right font. Maybe its a bit modified.

Nitzki
